=== About Me ===
I am James Falcon, a developer on <nowiki>[[http://www.canonical.com|Canonical's]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu]]</nowiki> Server team, working on <nowiki>[[https://cloud-init.io/|cloud-init]]</nowiki>. I have a BS in Computer Science and have spent most of my career writing software in Python. My interests lie primarily in backend systems and quality. Before joining Canonical in 2020, I worked on software in avionics, industrial automation, telecommunications, and distributed databases.
